resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74877</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74877</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-42a8-40e2-2084-bf055acdf681#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Pásztorok imádása, 1485, Santa Trinita, Sacetti-kápolna, Firenze, 167x167 cm. Tempera, tábla</string>
            <string language="en">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Adoration of the Shepherds, 1485, Santa Trinita, Sacetti-chapel, Florence, 167x167 cm. Tempera, plate.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Verehrung der 
Schäferhunde, 1485, Sankt Trinita, Sacetti-Kapelle, Florenz, 167x167
Zentimeter. Tempera, Platte.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Domenico Ghirlandaio : Adoration des 
bergers, 1485, Santa Trinita, Sacetti-chapelle, Florence, 167x167 
centimètre. Tempera, plat.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Adoration dos 
shepherds, 1485, Santa Trinita, Sacetti-sacetti-chapel, Florença, 
167x167 cm. Tempera, placa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Adoration degli 
shepherds, 1485, Santa Trinita, Sacetti-sacetti-chapel, Firenze, 
167x167 centimetro. Tempera, piastra.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Δομενηθο Ghirlandaio: Λατρεία των ποιμένων, 
1485, Santa Trinita, σαθεττη-παρεκκλησι, Φλωρεντία, 
167x167 εκατ. Tempera, πιάτο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Adoración de los 
pastores, 1485, Santa Trinita, Sacetti-capilla, Florencia, 167x167 
centímetro. Tempera, placa.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Pásztorok imádása mint képtípus zsánerszerű motívumok kidolgozására ad lehetőséget. Itt szövegszerű környezetben jeleníti meg a művész a témát.</string>
            <string language="en">The adoration of the shepherds as type of painting provides chance to elaborate genre motives. In this case the artist represents the matter in textual context. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Pásztorok imádása,  gyermek Jézus,  jászol,  15. század,  Santa trinita,  Ghirlandaio,  Domenico Ghirlandaio,  </string>
            <string language="en">adoration of the shepherds, Jesus as a child, manger, 15th century, Santa trinita,  Ghirlandaio,  Domenico Ghirlandaio,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Verehrung der Schäferhunde als Typ des Anstriches 
liefert Wahrscheinlichkeit, auszuarbeitn Genremotive. In diesem 
Fall stellt der Künstler den Stoff im Textkontext dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'adoration des bergers comme type de peinture fournit la 
chance d'élaborer des motifs de genre. Dans ce cas-ci l'artiste
représente la matière dans le contexte textuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O adoration dos shepherds como o tipo de pintura fornece a
possibilidade elaborar motriz do genre. Neste caso o artista 
representa a matéria no contexto textual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il adoration degli shepherds come tipo di pittura fornisce
la probabilità elaborare motivi di genere. In questo caso 
l'artista rappresenta la materia nel contesto testuale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λατρεία των ποιμένων ως τύπο ζωγραφικής παρέχει την
πιθανότητα να διαμορφωθούν τα κίνητρα ύφους. Σε αυτήν την 
περίπτωση ο καλλιτέχνης αντιπροσωπεύει το θέμα στο κειμενικό 
πλαίσιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La adoración de los pastores como tipo de pintura 
proporciona a la ocasión de elaborar los motivos del género. 
En este caso el artista representa la materia en contexto 
textual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verehrung der Schäferhunde, Jesus als Kind, Krippe, 15. 
Jahrhundert, Sankt trinita, Ghirlandaio, Domenico Ghirlandaio,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">adoration des bergers, Jésus en tant qu'enfant, mangeoire, 
15ème siècle, trinita de Santa, Ghirlandaio, Domenico Ghirlandaio,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">adoration dos shepherds, Jesus como uma criança, manger, 1ö 
século, trinita de Santa, Ghirlandaio, Domenico Ghirlandaio,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">adoration degli shepherds, Jesus come bambino, manger, 
quindicesimo secolo, trinita della Santa, Ghirlandaio, Domenico 
Ghirlandaio,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λατρεία των ποιμένων, Ιησούς ως παιδί, φάτνη, 15$ος 
αιώνας, Santa trinita, Ghirlandaio, Domenico 
Ghirlandaio,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">adoración de los pastores, Jesús como niño, manger, décimo 
quinto siglo, trinita de Santa, Ghirlandaio, Domenico Ghirlandaio,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74877</entry>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
